casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

August 13, 2008

[Cite as 0811312008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-4071.]

DISCIPLINARY CASES

2007-1581. Cleveland Bar Assn. v. Mitchell.

On April 23, 2008, this court suspended respondent for a period of 18 months with the last 12 months stayed on conditions and ordered her to pay board costs in the amount of $11,654.73. On July 24, 2008, respondent filed a motion to enlarge the time to pay costs of proceedings. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by this court that the motion is denied.
